description: This file defines the DevicePushToken class, representing device push tokens associated with users for notification purposes in a messaging backend. It includes properties for token details, platform info, and timestamps, with data annotations for validation and database schema mapping.

classes.name: DevicePushToken
classes.description: Represents a device's push notification token associated with a user, including metadata such as platform and creation time.

methods.name: Guid.NewGuid()
methods.description: Generates a new globally unique identifier for the Id property during object instantiation.
